Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Now begins the description of the adoption of Surath as the Eleventh Guru

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਹੁਣ ਸੁਰਥ ਯਾਰ੍ਹਵੇਂ ਗੁਰੂ ਦਾ ਕਥਨ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: CHAUPAI

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਦੱਤ ਦੇਵ ਤਦ ਅਗੇ ਚਲ ਪਿਆ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Then the sage Dutt, practising all the arts of Yoga, moved forward

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਨੇ) ਯੋਗ ਦੀ ਸਾਰੀ ਕਲਾ ਨੂੰ ਸਾਧਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਸੀ।
(ਉਸ ਦਾ) ਅਮਿਤ ਤੇਜ ਅਤੇ ਉਜਲਾ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵ ਸੀ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: His glory was infinite and he seemed to be the second God.211.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਇੰਜ ਪ੍ਰਤੀਤ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ) ਮਾਨੋ ਦੂਜਾ ਹਰਿ ਰਾਜਾ ਬਣਿਆ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੋਵੇ ॥੨੧੧॥

gurmukhi.Budha Dal Mehron: sB hI klw jog kI swDI ]

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਨੇ) ਯੋਗ ਦੀ ਸਾਰੀ ਕਲਾ ਸਾਧੀ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That great adept and the silence-observing purusha practiced all the skill of Yoga

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਸ) ਸ਼ਿਰੋਮਣੀ ਮੋਨੀ (ਦੱਤ) ਨੇ ਮਨ ਵਿਚੋਂ ਹੀ ਸਿੱਧੀ ਨੂੰ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤ ਕਰ ਲਿਆ ਹੈ।
(ਉਸ ਦਾ) ਬਹੁਤ ਅਧਿਕ ਤੇਜ ਅਤੇ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Seeing his extreme glory and impact, the seat of Indra also trembled.212.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਜਿਸ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ ਇੰਦਰ ਦਾ ਆਸਣ ਡੋਲ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ ॥੨੧੨॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: MADHUBHAAR STANZA BY THY GRACE
The generous sage, full of innumerable attributes, was absorbed in the devotion of the Lord and was under the submission of the Lord.213.
Forsaking the royal enjoyments that king of Yogis had adopted Sannyas and Yoga for the devotion and desire of meeting the Lord.214.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਹਰਿ ਭਗਤੀ ਨਾਲ ਪ੍ਰੇਮ ਪਾ ਲਿਆ ਹੈ ॥੨੧੪॥
(ਉਸ ਦੇ) ਮੁਖ ਉਤੇ ਅਪਾਰ ਛਬੀ ਹੈ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The beauty of the face of that perfect incarnation was enormous

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਹ) ਖੜਗ ਵਾਂਗ ਪੂਰੀ ਤਰ੍ਹਾਂ (ਕੁਸ਼ਾਂਗ੍ਰ ਬੁੱਧੀ ਵਾਲਾ)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He was sharp like dagger and was also skilful in many prominent sciences.215.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਵਿਸ਼ੇਸ਼ ਵਿਦਿਆ ਨੂੰ ਜਾਣਨ ਵਾਲਾ ਹੈ ॥੨੧੫॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That charming sage had unique greatness, unlimited glory and generous mind.216.
He was a god for Sannyasis and for the virtuous people he was mysterious, unmanifested and of unparalleled greatness.217.
His temperament was auspicious, the impact marvelous and the greatness unlimited.218.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਥੇ ਇਕ ਸੁਰਥ ਨਾਂ ਦਾ ਰਾਜਾ ਸੀ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: There was a king name Surath there who was attached with his assets and society who worshipped Chandi uninterruptedly.219.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਸ ਦਾ) ਸਰੂਪ ਸਭ ਢੰਗਾਂ ਨਾਲ ਅਖੰਡ ਸੀ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The king, who was extremely powerful and had complete control of his kingdom, was skilful in all the sciences and was under the submission of the goddess.220.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਹ ਉਸ) ਇਕ ਦੀ ਆਸ ਰਖਦਾ ਸੀ

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He served the goddess Bhavani night and day and remained unattached with only one desire in his mind.221.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਰਾਤ ਦਿਨ ਉਦਾਸ ਰਹਿੰਦਾ ਸੀ ॥੨੨੧॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: He used to worship Durga always in various ways and made offerings.222.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਹ ਬਹੁਤ ਗੁਣਾਂ ਦਾ ਖ਼ਜ਼ਾਨਾ ਸੀ,

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: That king was enromusly praiseworthy, treasure of virtues and had such a pure body that on seeing him, even the ganges felt shy.223.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਦੀ ਨਿਰਮਲਤਾ ਨੂੰ) ਵੇਖ ਕੇ ਗੰਗਾ ਵੀ ਲਜਾਉਂਦੀ ਸੀ ॥੨੨੩॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Seeing him, Dutt became extremely pure in intellect and completely lustrous.224.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਜਿਸ ਚਮਕ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ) ਗੰਗਾ ਸ਼ਰਮਾਉਂਦੀ ਸੀ।

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Seeing his limbs, even Ganges became shy, because he was enormously praiseworthy and a treasure of virtues.225.
The sage saw that he was bright like light, ever unattached and a king of Sannyasis with marvelous temperament.226.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੇਵਾ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ ਸੰਨਿਆਸ ਦੇਵ (ਦੱਤ)
ਅਤੇ (ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੇਵਾ ਭਗਤੀ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ)

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Dutt saw his serving nature and he was extremely pleased in his mind.227.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਮੋਹ ਦੀ ਫਾਹੀ ਵਿਚ ਫਸ ਗਿਆ ॥੨੨੭॥
